learner_profile.category_prompt: Generate concise, expert-level content for the next topic. Focus on advanced applications and cutting-edge concepts. Minimal guidance needed - encourage innovation.

topic_revisit_analysis.reasoning: Based on avg_objective_score and redo_topics count

strategy_recommendation.strategy_prompt: Long-format instructional videos for new content. Mid-video Q&A checkpoints.
strategy_recommendation.user_description: Progressing | Session: Long Sessions | Attention: High (>=11 min) | Format: Video

combined_output.final_prompt:
NEXT TOPIC (New Material): Ready to progress

CONTEXT: This learner is ready to progress to the next topic in their learning path.

LEARNER PROFILE: Generate concise, expert-level content for the next topic. Focus on advanced applications and cutting-edge concepts. Minimal guidance needed - encourage innovation.

DELIVERY STRATEGY: Long-format instructional videos for new content. Mid-video Q&A checkpoints.

IMPORTANT: Introduce new concepts for the next topic in their learning sequence. Ensure prerequisites are met before advancing to new material.

FINAL INSTRUCTION: Create personalized learning content by combining the learner profile guidance with the delivery strategy, keeping the topic context in mind.
